Sanitize table elements

This is copied over from xtable::sanitize().

sanitize(str, type = "latex")

Arguments

str

A character object.
type

"latex" or "html".

Value

The sanitized character object.

Examples

foo <- 'Make $$$ with us'
sanitize(foo, type = 'latex')
#> [1] "Make \\$\\$\\$ with us"

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
